item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0991; 03:09PM; 1838 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w0KN8G; #GramercyPark; First arriving 50 LAFD FIrefighters took less than 20 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire involving a steel cargo container (impromptu retail?) alongside a 100' x 50' one-story commercial building. A bold offensive fire attack confined fire to the contents of the container, preventing direct fire damage to the adjacent structure that contained a nail salon. One adult male civilian (unknown site affiliation or circumstances) sustained serious burn injuries to both legs. He will soon be transported by LAFD Paramedics to an area hospital. No other injuries reported. The cause of the fire is under active investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 CM32 E21 E221 E229 E233 E266 E285 E295 E34 E5 E57 E66 EM11 HR3 RA266 RA66 RA857 T21 T29 T33 T66 T85 T95 UR5 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0991; 02:49PM; 1838 W Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w0KN8G; #GramercyPark; PRELIM: One story commercial building with fire showing (from a nail salon?); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E221 E229 E233 E34 E57 E66 RA66 RA857 T21 T29 T33; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0923; 02:14PM; 11174 S Antwerp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t6q69v; #Watts; First arriving 28 LAFD Firefighters took just 18 minutes (2:32 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish a contents/mattress fire within one apartment. One adult female civilian has minor burn injury. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; AR1 BC1 BC13 E14 E21 E233 E264 EM1 EM2 RA264 RA64 RA65 RA864 T21 T33 T64 + LACoFD E41 SQ41 BC13; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0718; 12:26PM; 732 S Cabrillo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1fgzt; #SanPedro; The first arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took less than 15 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a *surface only* roof fire atop the two-story Cabrillo Avenue Elementary School. All (unknown total) building occupants were calmly and safely evacuated from the structure by school staff prior to LAFD arrival. No injury. Though technicians were on-site performing 'hot work' roof repairs at the time of the fire, the specific cause of the blaze is under investigation. Media Inquiries: LAUSD and School Administration.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC13 BC6 CM22 E112 E233 E238 E248 E264 E285 E36 E38 E48 E85 EM13 EM6 RA264 RA36 RA64 RA864 T33 T38 T48 T64 T85; CH9; 13 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0718; 12:11PM; 732 S Cabrillo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q1fgzt; #SanPedro; PRELIM: Fire and smoke showing from the roof of the 2 story (LAUSD) Cabrillo Avenue Elementary School.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E112 E238 E248 E48 E85 RA36 RA864 T38 T48; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0499; 10:08AM; 1313 N Sycamore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w07o5g; #Hollywood; First arriving 30 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames within the interior and attic of a vacant and boarded one-story home, the site of previous fires. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 CM22 E229 E235 E261 E29 E482 E52 E61 EM18 RA68 RA97 T29 T35 T61; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0499; 09:49AM; 1313 N Sycamore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w07o5g; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Heavy smoke from a vacant and boarded one-story home, the site of previous fires.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E261 E482 E52 E61 RA68 RA97 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1029; 04:29PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; Firefighters located a deceased (age/gender unknown at this time) person behind debris and file cabinets while searching the building. Excessive storage within the office units forced a delay in conducting a full search until the fire was extinguished. LAFD Arson and LAPD are conducting the investigation. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz is on scene for media availability. Media staging location is Sixth St just east of Catalina. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA13 RA29 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1029; 03:53PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters achieved a knockdown in 35 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters faced difficulties in reaching the fire, requiring a breach of the interior walls. All occupants (number unknown) were safely evacuated. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol. LAFD PIO Firefighter David Ortiz will be on scene shortly for media availability. No further details.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 HR3 PI2 RA13 RA29 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1029; 03:51PM; 611 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HWq6Nf; Koreatown; Firefighters had to breach interior walls to reach and get water on the fire located in two units on the 2nd floor of the (updated) four story commercial over parking. The office building is occupied but all have safely evacuated (number unknown). Crews are making good progress with no injuries reported.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 BC9 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E235 E26 E27 E29 E52 E6 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA803 RA829 T11 T26 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
